name: ART LIST - a simple list of news articles that matched the search
ART GALLERY - art layout of news articles that matched the search AND that include a social sharing image
IMAGE COLLAGE - matching images. Most relevant when used with the image-related search terms.
IMAGE COLLAGE INFO - as for IMAGE COLLAGE but includes links
IMAGE GALLERY - alternative layout to IMAGE COLLAGE INFO
IMAGE COLLAGE SHARE - lists social sharing images found in the matching articles, where present.
WORDCLOUD IMAGE TAGS - histogram of image tags assigned by Google\'s Cloud Vision algorithms.
WORDCLOUD IMAGE WEB-TAGS - as above, but based on taxonomy tags assigned by Google CV based on captions identified via reverse Google Images searches.
TONE CHART - emotional histogram showing the tonal distribution of coverage of your query. Articles typically score within ±20 (max ±100).
